text: Liverpool 8 is the fourteenth studio album by Ringo Starr. The album was released on January 15, 2008.Andrew Grant Jackson, Still the Greatest: The Essential Songs of the Beatles' Solo Careers (Lanham, MD: Scarecrow Press, 2012), p. 292 It was his first and only studio album on the Capitol Records label. Liverpool 8 is the postal district of the Toxteth area of Liverpool where Starr was born. == References == Category:2008 albums Category:Ringo Starr
title: Liverpool 8
